description:
Anya Taylor-Joy has been making headlines due to her involvement in the newly-released film Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga. She plays the titular character Furiosa in the Mad Max spin-off, and while plenty of fans are discussing her performance in the movie, a previous interview with Taylor-Joy resurfaced. As part of a rather heartbreaking revelation, [...]

The post Anya Taylor-Joy Says She Was Bullied Over Her Eyes appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Anya Taylor-Joy Says She Was Bullied Over Her Eyes
